title: Survey and Starbucks!
description:
Hi Legally Judgy Fam!

We've come back during our summer hiatus to ask that you fill out a survey to help us improve our show in anticipation of Season 2.  And if helping us isn't enough motivation, we'll be choosing 5 lucky people at random to win a Starbucks gift card!  Link to survey below!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSepSpfCbZVTv-CHjgDOju_KbB5lgoZGSvTWG_QT0KhWCws1rg/viewform
dc:creator: Alecole Productions
